actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 32.

official_title: A bill to provide an extension of time for filing individual income tax returns in the case of a Federal Government shutdown.

summary.text: Extends the deadline for the filing of tax returns for calendar year 2010 if there is a federal government shutdown beginning after April 8, 2011, and before April 19, 2011, until no earlier than the date that is 10 calendar days after the end of such shutdown.

titles.title: A bill to provide an extension of time for filing individual income tax returns in the case of a Federal Government shutdown.
A bill to provide an extension of time for filing individual income tax returns in the case of a Federal Government shutdown.
